pageProps.title: Getting started with Blender: Complete guide
pageProps.metaDesc: Blender is a free and open-source 3D creation software that has become one of the most popular tools for artists and designers. It offers a powerful and versatile set of features that allow users to create a wide range of 3D models, animations, and visual effects. In this article, we will guide you through the basics of getting started with Blender and help you get familiar with its interface and tools.
